[
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the Redux store",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "BDD gherkin style",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the ReduxToolkit",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "BDD gherkin style",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "another feature",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "bob@mail.com",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "yet another feature",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "OMG a feature!",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: "
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        }
      ],
      "checks": [
        {
          "name": "imperative style",
          "features": [],
          "whens": {},
          "thens": {}
        }
      ]
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the LoginPage as react",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "Set the email and check the email",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "Set the email by initial state, then set the email normally, and then check some other stuff",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: secret"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: wade@rpc"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIs: secret"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsNot: idk"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't show an email error just because the email does not validate",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsNotAnEmailError: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "Do show an email error after submitting",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheLoginIsSubmitted: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsAnEmailError: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "a classical react component, bundled with esbuild and tested with puppeteer",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "default",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThePropsIs: [object Object]"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: [object Object]"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "default",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThePropsIs: [object Object]"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: [object Object]"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "default",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: [object Object]"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "default",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: [object Object]"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"

    "test": {
      "name": "a classical react component, bundled with esbuild and tested with puppeteer",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "idk",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            }

          "thens": [

  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the Server with Puppeteer",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "a boring Puppeteer feature",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: some great status"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "a nother Puppeteer feature",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: hello"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "yet another Puppeteer feature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "a feature",
          "features": [],
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 0"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "still further Puppeteer features?!",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 1"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 2"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 3"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "another Puppeteer feature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: aloha"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 3"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 7"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the Node server with fetch",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "a http boringfeature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: some great status"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "a http feature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: hello"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "a httpfeature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "a feature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 0"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "a httpfeature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 1"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 2"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 3"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        },
        {
          "name": "another http feature",
          "features": [
            {
              "name": "hello"
            }
          ],
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: aloha"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 3"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 7"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {}
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
